INAUFPK #include INConst #include COMSYS ; SR17138 change to (class/form) don't remove comment.
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; VORGABE DER KONDITIONEN ; ; Inputs : ; ; ; ByRef : ; YKEY idOrder,idLine[,idSupplier] ; YFKEY ; YFELD ; YFORM form name "INAUFPK" ; YDATEI class name "INAUFPA", "INERECH1" ; ; Returns : ; ; ; History : ; 28-Sep-2006 GRF Doco; objINAUF and macros in GESRAB ; 04-Sep-2006 GRF Naked References; doco; quits; long lines split ; 03-Jun-2005 shobby SR12008: Called INAUFDISC ("INAUF" is header class) ; 09-Oct-2000 DT ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- NEW AUF,KOND,POS,YI
SET AUF=$PIECE(YKEY,",",1) QUIT:AUF="" SET POS=$PIECE(YKEY,",",2) QUIT:POS=""
;+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ; KOND objINAUFPK ; KOND objINAUFPA ;+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
SET KOND=$GET(^INAUFPK(YM,AUF,POS,1)) ;AUS POSITION ;out of IF $PIECE(YKEY,",",3)="" DO ;LIEFERANT ;supplier . SET $PIECE(YKEY,",",3) = $PIECE($GET(^INAUFP(YM,AUF,POS,1)),Y,12) . SET $PIECE(YFKEY,",",3) = $PIECE($GET(^INAUFP(YM,AUF,POS,1)),Y,12)
IF YFORM="INAUFPK" DO . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,16)="" . . SET $PIECE(KOND,Y,16)=$PIECE($GET(^INAUFP(YM,AUF,POS,1)),Y,5) ;MENGE ;quantity . . IF +$PIECE(KOND,Y,41)'=0 SET $PIECE(KOND,Y,16)=$PIECE(KOND,Y,16)*$PIECE(YFELD,Y,41) . do Recalculate2^INAUFDISC(.YFELD,"INAUF",AUF,POS) ;SR12008
QUIT:$TRANSLATE(YFELD,Y)'="" ;SCHON DATEN ERFASST ;yet IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,16)="" DO . IF YFORM'="INAUFPK" IF +$PIECE($GET(^INAUFPK(YM,AUF,POS,1)),Y,41)'=0 SET $PIECE(KOND,Y,16)=$PIECE(^INAUFPK(YM,AUF,POS,1),Y,16) QUIT ; 04-Sep-2006 . SET $PIECE(KOND,Y,16)=$PIECE($GET(^INAUFP(YM,AUF,POS,1)),Y,5) ;MENGE ;quantity
IF +$PIECE(KOND,Y,16)'=0 IF +$PIECE(KOND,Y,47)=0 SET $PIECE(KOND,Y,47)=$JUSTIFY($PIECE(KOND,Y,12)/$PIECE(KOND,Y,16)*$$^INQTYUNIT(,AUF,POS),0,2) ;EINZEIPREIS = GES/MENGE ;IF +$PIECE(KOND,Y,16)'=0 SET $PIECE(KOND,Y,47)=$JUSTIFY($PIECE(KOND,Y,13)/$PIECE(KOND,Y,16),0,2) ;EINZEIPREIS = GES/MENGE
DO ;SUCHEN AUFTRAGSBESTÄTIGUNG ;seek order confirmation . NEW LIEFAB,ABNUM . SET LIEFAB=$ORDER(^INAUFPA(YM,AUF,POS,""),-1) ;LETZTER LIEFERANT ;last supplier . QUIT:LIEFAB="" . SET ABNUM=$ORDER(^INAUFPA(YM,AUF,POS,LIEFAB,""),-1) ;LETZTE AB ;last Confirm. . QUIT:ABNUM="" . IF $GET(YDATEI)="INAUFPA" DO ;AUS VORHERIGER AB ;out of Confirm. . . SET KOND=$GET(^INAUFPA(YM,AUF,POS,LIEFAB,ABNUM,1)) ;AUS AB ;out of Confirm.
/*vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv DISABLED BLOCK START ;IF $GET(YDATEI)="INAUFPA" DO ;BEI AB . NEW LIEFAB,ABNUM,POSX . SET POSX=$ORDER(^INAUFPA(YM,AUF,POS),-1) ;LETZTE POSITION ;last line . QUIT:POSX="" . SET LIEFAB=$ORDER(^INAUFPA(YM,AUF,POSX,""),-1) ;LETZTER LIEFERANT ;last supplier . QUIT:LIEFAB="" . SET ABNUM=$ORDER(^INAUFPA(YM,AUF,POSX,LIEFAB,""),-1) ;LETZTE AB ;last Confirm. . QUIT:ABNUM="" . SET $PIECE(YKEY,",",4)=ABNUM ;^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ DISABLED BLOCK END */
FOR YI=2:1:7,9,10,12,13,15,16,18,21,47,25 { ; 04-Sep-2006 split line to clarify SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,YI)=$PIECE(KOND,Y,YI) SET $PIECE(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"D",1),Y,YI)=$PIECE(KOND,Y,YI) ;KOPIEREN DATEN AUS POSITION ;out of }
IF YDATEI="INAUFPA" DO . NEW LIETM . SET LIETM=$PIECE($GET(^INAUFP(YM,AUF,POS,1)),Y,19) ;LIEFERTERMIN POSITION ;time of delivery . IF LIETM="" SET LIETM=$PIECE($GET(^INAUF(YM,AUF,1)),Y,19) ;AUS AUFRAG ;out of . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,23)=LIETM ;KOPIEREN DATEN AUS POSITION ;out of . FOR YI=68,78,79 DO ; 04-Sep-2006 split line to clarify . . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,YI)=$PIECE(KOND,Y,YI) . . SET $PIECE(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"D",1),Y,YI)=$PIECE(KOND,Y,YI) ;ÜBERTRAGEN FREMSDWÄHRUNG;26316;FIS;25.08.04
IF (YDATEI="INERECH1") || (YDATEI="INAUFPA") SET YI=22 SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,YI)=$$^INNETTO(YFELD,1) ;KOPIEREN DATEN AUS POSITION ;out of QUIT
GESRAB ; GESAMTRABATT ANZEIGEN ;display Discount NEW AUF,KOND,objINAUF,POS,YI
SET AUF=$PIECE(YKEY,",",1) QUIT:AUF="" SET POS=$PIECE(YKEY,",",2) QUIT:POS=""
SET objINAUF = $GET(^INAUF(YM,AUF,1)) ;AUFTRAG ;order IF +$$$INAUFSurchargeAmount(objINAUF)=0 IF +$$$INAUFSurcharge(objINAUF)=0 QUIT ; D251/252 No Discount ;KEIN GESAMTRABATT
WRITE " "_$$^WWWTEXT(33061)_": " ; "Discount On Total: " IF +$$$INAUFSurchargeAmount(objINAUF)'=0 WRITE $$^WWWZAHL($$$INAUFSurchargeAmount(objINAUF),0,2)_"   " IF +$$$INAUFSurcharge(objINAUF)'=0 WRITE $$^WWWZAHL($$$INAUFSurcharge(objINAUF),0,2)_"% " quit
OnAfterSave(YKEY,YFELD) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Update INARTK from INAUFPK ; ; Inputs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 24-Feb-2010 shobby SR17206: Populate the Unit Price field in INARTK ; 10-Feb-2010 shobby SR17138.3 Conditional with INVORG setup. ; 09-Feb-2010 shobby SR17138.2 Call out to DoSave. ; 05-Feb-2010 shobby SR17138: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new objINARTK,idItem,idSupplier,objINAUFP,strStatus
set strStatus=$$$OK if '$$$NoKey(YKEY) { if $$$INVORGUpdateItemConditionsPerSu($get(^INVORG(YM,YM,1)))=1 { ;When Editing order Line. set objINAUFP=$get(^INAUFP(YM,$$$KEY1(YKEY),$$$KEY2(YKEY),1)) set idItem=$$$INAUFPItemNumber(objINAUFP) set idSupplier=$$$INAUFPSupplier(objINAUFP) if (idItem'="")&&(idSupplier'="") { set objINARTK=$get(^INARTK(YM,idItem,idSupplier,1)) if objINARTK'="" { if $$$INAUFPKDeliveryQuantityFullLot(YFELD) =$$$INARTKDeliveryQuantityUnit(objINARTK) { set $$$INARTKBasicPurchasePrice(objINARTK) =$$$INAUFPKUnitPrice(YFELD) set $$$INARTKUnitPrice(objINARTK) =$$$INAUFPKUnitPrice(YFELD) ;SR17206 set strStatus=$$DoSave("INARTK",idItem_","_idSupplier,objINARTK) } } } } } quit strStatus
DoSave(YFORM,YKEY,YFELD) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Before saving it is necessary to recalculate a few values. Unfortunately the routine ; that does that is tied to the free globals so we have to fudge a bit. ; ; Inputs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 09-Feb-2010 shobby SR17138.2: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; set ^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"D",1)= YFELD set ^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"P",1)= YKEY do ^INNETTOBRUTTO set YFELD =^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"D",1) kill YFORM ;Save will fail if this is not killed. quit $$Save^COMUtils("INARTK",YKEY,YFELD,$$$YES)
